thread.title: 'We are in the final year' Shock Bible passages 'reveal apocalypse will strike in 2017'
thread.title_full: 'We are in the final year' Shock Bible passages 'reveal apocalypse will strike in 2017'

title: 'We are in the final year' Shock Bible passages 'reveal apocalypse will strike in 2017'
text:
Published 20th February 2017 
GETTY REVEALED: Life as we know it is set to end this year, it has been claimed 
Hardcore Christians believe it is only a matter of months before they will be sent to paradise. 
Website Signs of End Times claims it has “amazing evidence” that it can be easily seen in the Bible that the end of the world is in 2017. 
Natural disasters, earthquakes and mass animal deaths are all pointed to as foretelling our impending doom. 
GETTY DESTRUCTION: There are signs of our impending doom in 2017, Christians believe 
It says: “Never has there been a time before when all these events were evident in so many diverse places and with such frequency and intensity. 
“Our generation is the first generation to fulfil all the biblical signs. 
“Without doubt we are living in the final year.” Days in history when the Earth stood still Tuesday, 1st March 2016 Some of the most horrific events in history which the world will never forget. 1 / 40 Getty Days in history when the Earth stood still 
The Biblical chapter of Hosea, chapter 4 verse 3, says one sign will be the mass loss of life on Earth. 
The website points out what it claims is evidence of this happening, linking to numerous articles, including the mass deaths of species of bats, fish and honey bees. 
While in the books of Matthew and Luke, natural disasters are also seen as signs of the end. 
GETTY RETURN: Many believe Jesus Christ will bring forth the apocalypse this year 
The website says the amount of earthquakes this year have been increasing. 
It points to website Earthquake Track, which reveals there have been nearly 4,000 earthquakes this year alone. 
Signs of End Times adds: “God is giving us plenty of warning through these events, and we will be without excuse if that day of Christ's return comes upon us like a thief in the night and catches us unaware. We need to heed the signs and get ready.” Nuclear Fallout: Luxury bunkers for the end of the world Sunday, 13th November 2016 Survival firm Vivos is building and furnishing fallout bunkers for anyone who wants to survive nuclear war, a disease pandemic or the apocalypse. 1 / 26 
Many doomsayers also believe the apocalypse will happen in 2017. 
Christian website UNSEALED claim a solar eclipse on August 21 this year will herald the end of the world. 
And Reverend Donna Larson, who runs blog Rapture and End Times, believes the 6,000 years of man’s rule on Earth will end in 2017 . Nostradamus Predictions for 2017 Tuesday, 29th November 2016 Daily Star Pictures is looking into our crystal balls and checking Nostradamus’ books to see what he predicted would happen in 2017. 1 / 10 “Without doubt we are living in the final year” Website Signs of End Times 
But Carl Olson, editor of Catholic World Report, has rejected these beliefs. 
He claims it is impossible to work out when the end of the world will take place. 
In fact the Bible actually says in the book of Matthew “no one knows” when it will happen. 
GETTY SIGNS: The Bible is believed to show when the end of the world will be 
He said: “Date-setting is not an option. 
“It could be many more centuries or millennia before Christ comes again – or it could be very soon. 
“Anticipation and readiness need not turn into despair, fear, or the error of date setting. 
“It means nothing in the end.” 
Will the end of the world happen this year? You decide.. Related articles
